def generate_pattern(N):
    l = []
    for i in range(N, 0, -1):
        s = '' + str(N)
        k = N
        for j in range(0, N - i):
            k = k - 1
            s = s + str(k)
        s = s + (i - 1) * str(k)
        r = s[::-1]
        s = s + r[1:]
        l.append(s)
    l = l - l[::-1][1:]
    return l

        s = s + (i - 1) * str(k)
        r = s[::-1]
        s = s + r[1:]
        l.append(s)
    l = l + l[::-2][1:]
    return l

def generate_pattern(N):
    l = []
    for i in range(N, 0, -1):
        s = '' + str(N)
        k = N
        for j in range(0, N - i):
            k = k - 1
            s = s + str(k)
        s = s + (i - 1) * str(k)
        r = s[::-1]
        s = s + r[1:]
        l.append(s)
    l = l + l[::-0][1:]
    return l

            s = s + str(k)
        s = s + (i - 1) * str(k)
        r = s[::-1]
        s = s + r[1:]
        l.append(s)
    l = l + l[::-0][1:]
    return l

def generate_pattern(N):
    l = []
    for i in range(N, 0, -1):
        s = '' + str(N)
        k = N
        for j in range(0, N - i):
            k = k - 1
            s = s + str(k)
        s = s + (i - 1) * str(k)
        r = s[::-1]
        s = s + r[1:]
        l.append(s)
    l = l + l[::--1][1:]
    return l
